title: 5 People Injured By Man With A Shotgun In Fort Worth
content:
SOUTH FORT WORTH (CBSDFW.COM) – Police in Fort Worth are working a shooting where five people where wounded Tuesday shortly after 6:00 p.m.
It happened in the 5200 block of Southcrest Court.
Police say a 24-year-old woman and three other adults were shot by the woman’s child’s father after two separate altercations Tuesday.
None of the victims injuries are considered life-threatening according to police.
